verses.text: And it came to pass, when all the \w people|strong="H1471"\w* were \w clean|strong="H8552"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* you \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* out of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, out of \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*,

And \w command|strong="H6680"\w* ye them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H5375"\w* you hence out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, out of the place where the \w priests’|strong="H3548"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w stood|strong="H4673"\w* \w firm|strong="H3559"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and ye shall carry them \w over|strong="H5674"\w* with you, and \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* them in the lodging \w place|strong="H4411"\w*, where ye shall \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* this \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

Then \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, whom he had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, out of \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*:

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and take ye \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of you a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* upon his \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w*, according unto the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

That this may be a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you, \add that\add* when your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \add their fathers\add* in time to \w come|strong="H4279"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add mean\add* ye by these \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*?\f + \fr 4.6 \ft in time…: Heb. to morrow\f*

Then ye shall \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* them, That the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* were cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; when it passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* were cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*: and these \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* shall be for a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so as \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, and took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and carried them \w over|strong="H5674"\w* with them unto the place where they \w lodged|strong="H4411"\w*, and laid them \w down|strong="H3240"\w* there.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, in the place where the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* which \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w stood|strong="H4673"\w*: and they are there unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ For the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* which \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, until every \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* was \w finished|strong="H8552"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, according to all that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w* and passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.

And it came to pass, when all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w clean|strong="H8552"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, that the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, in the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w armed|strong="H2571"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto them:

About \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w prepared|strong="H2502"\w* for \w war|strong="H6635"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, to the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.\f + \fr 4.13 \ft prepared: or, ready armed\f*

¶ On that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and they \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* him, as they \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, that they come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.
\w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* therefore \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Come ye \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* were come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \add and\add* the \w soles|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w priests’|strong="H3548"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* were lifted \w up|strong="H5423"\w* unto the dry \w land|strong="H2724"\w*, that the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto their \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and \w flowed|strong="H3212"\w* over all his \w banks|strong="H1415"\w*, \w as|strong="H8543"\w* \add they did\add* \w before|strong="H8032"\w*.\f + \fr 4.18 \ft lifted…: Heb. plucked up\f*\f + \fr 4.18 \ft flowed: Heb. went\f*

¶ And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* on the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, in the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \w border|strong="H7097"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

And those \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, which they took \w out|strong="H3947"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, did \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w pitch|strong="H6965"\w* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.

And he \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in time to \w come|strong="H4279"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add mean\add* these \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*?\f + \fr 4.21 \ft in time…: Heb. to morrow\f*

Then ye shall let your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* came \w over|strong="H5674"\w* this \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* on dry \w land|strong="H3004"\w*.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, until ye were passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, which he dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us, until we were gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w*:

That all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* might \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that it \add is\add* \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w*: that ye might \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.  +  r 4.24  t for ever: Heb. all days *
